name: ai-writing-assistant
description: Chrome extension for AI-powered writing assistance with PDF support

scripts.install-pdf: npm install pdfjs-dist@4.2.67 && mkdir -p lib && cp node_modules/pdfjs-dist/build/pdf.min.mjs lib/pdf.min.js && cp node_modules/pdfjs-dist/build/pdf.worker.min.mjs lib/pdf.worker.min.js

note: This package.json is only needed for development to update PDF.js library. End users can install the extension directly from the files in this directory.
